/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. From the vantage point of a car on the road, the viewer's gaze is directed towards the left side of the frame. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. A white car is visible on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Above, the sky is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
